name: salesforce
description: Salesforce is a leading CRM platform integrating sales, service, marketing, and analytics to build customer relationships and drive business growth

tools.name: SALESFORCE_ACCOUNT_CREATION_WITH_CONTENT_TYPE_OPTION
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Creates a new Salesforce Account using a JSON POST request, requiring 'Name'; specific fields (e.g., custom, DunsNumber) may have org-level prerequisites.

inputSchema.title: AccountCreationWithContentTypeOptionRequest

Id.title: Id
Id.description: Unique identifier for the account (system-generated and read-only upon creation).

Sic.title: Sic
Sic.description: Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code (max 20 chars). For business accounts only.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Name of the account (required, max 255 chars). For Person Accounts, this is a concatenated field from the associated contact and not directly modifiable.

Site.title: Site
Site.description: Name of the account’s specific location or site (max 80 chars).

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Type of account, influencing categorization and behavior.

Phone.title: Phone
Phone.description: Primary phone number for the account (max 40 chars).

Jigsaw.title: Jigsaw
Jigsaw.description: Data.com company ID reference (max 20 chars, API v22.0+). For business accounts. Read-only, do not modify.

SLA__c.title: Sla  C
SLA__c.description: Custom field for Service Level Agreement (SLA) type/details.

OwnerId.title: Owner Id
OwnerId.description: ID of the Salesforce user owning this account. 'Transfer Record' permission may be needed to update if not the API user (API v16.0+).

SicDesc.title: Sic Desc
SicDesc.description: Description of line of business based on SIC code (max 80 chars). For business accounts only.

Website.title: Website
Website.description: Website URL of the account (max 255 chars).

Industry.title: Industry
Industry.description: Primary industry of the account (picklist, max 40 chars).

ParentId.title: Parent Id
ParentId.description: ID of the parent account for subsidiary or hierarchical relationships.

PhotoUrl.title: Photo Url
PhotoUrl.description: URL path for the social network profile image (read-only). Blank if Social Accounts and Contacts is not enabled for the user.

Active__c.title: Active  C
Active__c.description: Custom field indicating if the account is active.

IsDeleted.title: Is Deleted
IsDeleted.description: Indicates if the account is in the Recycle Bin (read-only).

NaicsCode.title: Naics Code
NaicsCode.description: NAICS code (6-digit industry classifier, max 8 chars). For business accounts. Requires Data.com Prospector/Clean.

NaicsDesc.title: Naics Desc
NaicsDesc.description: Description of line of business based on NAICS code (max 120 chars). For business accounts. Requires Data.com Prospector/Clean.

DunsNumber.title: Duns Number
DunsNumber.description: D-U-N-S number (9-digit identifier, max 9 chars). For business accounts. Requires Data.com Prospector/Clean.

Tradestyle.title: Tradestyle
Tradestyle.description: Organization's 'Doing Business As' (DBA) name (max 255 chars). For business accounts. Requires Data.com Prospector/Clean.

BillingCity.title: Billing City
BillingCity.description: City for the billing address (max 40 chars).

CleanStatus.title: Clean Status
CleanStatus.description: Data quality status compared with Data.com.

CreatedById.title: Created By Id
CreatedById.description: ID of the user who created the account (read-only).

CreatedDate.title: Created Date
CreatedDate.description: Date and time of account creation (read-only).

Description.title: Description
Description.description: Text description of the account (max 32,000 chars).

YearStarted.title: Year Started
YearStarted.description: Year the organization was established (max 4 chars). For business accounts. Requires Data.com Prospector/Clean.

BillingState.title: Billing State
BillingState.description: State or province for the billing address (max 80 chars).

ShippingCity.title: Shipping City
ShippingCity.description: City for the shipping address (max 40 chars).

TickerSymbol.title: Ticker Symbol
TickerSymbol.description: Stock market ticker symbol (max 20 chars). For business accounts only.

AccountNumber.title: Account Number
AccountNumber.description: Account number assigned to this account (max 40 chars).

AccountSource.title: Account Source
AccountSource.description: Origin source of the account record (admin-defined picklist, values max 40 chars).

BillingStreet.title: Billing Street
BillingStreet.description: Street address for the billing location.

ShippingState.title: Shipping State
ShippingState.description: State or province for the shipping address (max 80 chars).

BillingCountry.title: Billing Country
BillingCountry.description: Country for the billing address (max 80 chars).

DandbCompanyId.title: Dandb Company Id
DandbCompanyId.description: Associated Dun & Bradstreet company ID for D&B integration (read-only).

LastViewedDate.title: Last Viewed Date
LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp of when current user last viewed this account record (read-only).

MasterRecordId.title: Master Record Id
MasterRecordId.description: ID of the master record if this account was merged (read-only).

ShippingStreet.title: Shipping Street
ShippingStreet.description: Street address for the shipping location (max 255 chars).

SystemModstamp.title: System Modstamp
SystemModstamp.description: Timestamp of last modification by user or automated process (read-only).

BillingLatitude.title: Billing Latitude
BillingLatitude.description: Latitude for the billing address (-90 to 90, up to 15 decimal places).

ShippingCountry.title: Shipping Country
ShippingCountry.description: Country for the shipping address (max 80 chars).

attributes__url.title: Attributes  Url
attributes__url.description: Internal Salesforce field: Relative API URL for this SObject record. System-set or read-only.

BillingLongitude.title: Billing Longitude
BillingLongitude.description: Longitude for the billing address (-180 to 180, up to 15 decimal places).

LastActivityDate.title: Last Activity Date
LastActivityDate.description: Most recent due date of an event or closed task associated with the record (read-only).

LastModifiedById.title: Last Modified By Id
LastModifiedById.description: ID of the user who last modified the account (read-only).

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Date and time of last modification (read-only).

OperatingHoursId.title: Operating Hours Id
OperatingHoursId.description: ID of associated operating hours. Requires Salesforce Field Service.

ShippingLatitude.title: Shipping Latitude
ShippingLatitude.description: Latitude for the shipping address (-90 to 90, up to 15 decimal places).

attributes__type.title: Attributes  Type
attributes__type.description: Internal Salesforce field: Type of the SObject (e.g., 'Account'). System-set or read-only.

BillingPostalCode.title: Billing Postal Code
BillingPostalCode.description: Postal code for the billing address (max 20 chars).

ShippingLongitude.title: Shipping Longitude
ShippingLongitude.description: Longitude for the shipping address (-180 to 180, up to 15 decimal places).

LastReferencedDate.title: Last Referenced Date
LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp of when current user last accessed this record or related items (read-only).

SLASerialNumber__c.title: Sla Serial Number  C
SLASerialNumber__c.description: Custom field for SLA serial number.

ShippingPostalCode.title: Shipping Postal Code
ShippingPostalCode.description: Postal code for the shipping address (max 20 chars).

CustomerPriority__c.title: Customer Priority  C
CustomerPriority__c.description: Custom field for customer priority (e.g., High, Medium, Low).

NumberofLocations__c.title: Numberof Locations  C
NumberofLocations__c.description: Custom field for the number of physical locations.

SLAExpirationDate__c.title: Sla Expiration Date  C
SLAExpirationDate__c.description: Custom field for SLA expiration date.

UpsellOpportunity__c.title: Upsell Opportunity  C
UpsellOpportunity__c.description: Custom field indicating upsell opportunity potential.

BillingGeocodeAccuracy.title: Billing Geocode Accuracy
BillingGeocodeAccuracy.description: Accuracy level of the geocode for the billing address.

ShippingGeocodeAccuracy.title: Shipping Geocode Accuracy
ShippingGeocodeAccuracy.description: Accuracy level of the geocode for the shipping address.

inputSchema.description: Request for creating a Salesforce Account, specifying account details.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_ADD_CONTACT_TO_CAMPAIGN
tools.description: Adds a contact to a campaign by creating a CampaignMember record, allowing you to track campaign engagement.

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the campaign member. Common values include 'Sent', 'Responded'. The available statuses depend on campaign configuration.

contact_id.title: Contact Id
contact_id.description: The Salesforce ID of the contact to add to the campaign.

campaign_id.title: Campaign Id
campaign_id.description: The Salesforce ID of the campaign to add the contact to.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_ADD_LEAD_TO_CAMPAIGN
tools.description: Adds a lead to a campaign by creating a CampaignMember record, allowing you to track campaign engagement.

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the campaign member. Common values include 'Sent', 'Responded'. The available statuses depend on campaign configuration.

lead_id.title: Lead Id
lead_id.description: The Salesforce ID of the lead to add to the campaign.

campaign_id.title: Campaign Id
campaign_id.description: The Salesforce ID of the campaign to add the lead to.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_ADD_OPPORTUNITY_LINE_ITEM
tools.description: Adds a product (line item) to an opportunity. The product must exist in a pricebook entry that's associated with the opportunity's pricebook.

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Discount percentage (0-100). Cannot be used with TotalPrice.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The quantity of the product to add.

unit_price.title: Unit Price
unit_price.description: The sales price per unit. If not specified, uses the standard price from the pricebook entry.

description.title: Description
description.description: Optional description for this line item.

total_price.title: Total Price
total_price.description: The total price for this line item. Cannot be used with UnitPrice or Discount.

service_date.title: Service Date
service_date.description: Service date for the product in YYYY-MM-DD format.

opportunity_id.title: Opportunity Id
opportunity_id.description: The Salesforce ID of the opportunity to add a product to.

pricebook_entry_id.title: Pricebook Entry Id
pricebook_entry_id.description: The ID of the PricebookEntry that contains the product and price information. This links to a specific product in a specific pricebook.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_APPLY_LEAD_ASSIGNMENT_RULES
tools.description: Applies configured lead assignment rules to a specific lead, automatically routing it to the appropriate owner based on your organization's rules.

lead_id.title: Lead Id
lead_id.description: The Salesforce ID of the lead to apply assignment rules to.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_ASSOCIATE_CONTACT_TO_ACCOUNT
tools.description: Associates a contact with an account by updating the contact's AccountId field.

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: The Salesforce ID of the account to associate the contact with.

contact_id.title: Contact Id
contact_id.description: The Salesforce ID of the contact to associate with an account.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CLONE_OPPORTUNITY_WITH_PRODUCTS
tools.description: Clones an opportunity and optionally its products (line items). Creates a new opportunity with the same field values and products as the original.

new_name.title: New Name
new_name.description: Name for the cloned opportunity. If not specified, will append 'Clone of' to original name.

close_date.title: Close Date
close_date.description: Close date for the cloned opportunity in YYYY-MM-DD format. If not specified, uses original close date.

stage_name.title: Stage Name
stage_name.description: Stage for the cloned opportunity. If not specified, uses original stage.

clone_products.title: Clone Products
clone_products.description: Whether to clone the opportunity's products (line items). Set to false to clone only the opportunity.

opportunity_id.title: Opportunity Id
opportunity_id.description: The ID of the opportunity to clone.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CLONE_RECORD
tools.description: Creates a copy of an existing Salesforce record by reading its data, removing system fields, and creating a new record. Optionally apply field updates to the clone.

record_id.title: Record Id
record_id.description: The ID of the record to clone.

object_type.title: Object Type
object_type.description: The Salesforce object type to clone (e.g., Account, Contact, Lead, Opportunity).

field_updates.title: Field Updates
field_updates.description: Optional field updates to apply to the cloned record as a JSON string. Use this to modify specific fields in the clone. Example: '{"Name": "Clone of Original", "Status": "New"}'

tools.name: SALESFORCE_COMPLETE_TASK
tools.description: Marks a task as completed with optional completion notes. This is a convenience action that updates the task status to 'Completed'.

task_id.title: Task Id
task_id.description: The Salesforce ID of the task to mark as completed.

completion_notes.title: Completion Notes
examples: Call completed successfully. Customer agreed to proceed.
completion_notes.description: Optional notes to add about the task completion. Will be appended to existing description.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_ACCOUNT
tools.description: Creates a new account in Salesforce with the specified information.

parent_id.title: Parent Id
parent_id.description: ID of the parent account if this is a subsidiary. Must be a valid Salesforce Account Id (15- or 18-character).

description.title: Description
examples: Fortune 500 company specializing in consumer goods

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_CAMPAIGN
tools.description: Creates a new campaign in Salesforce with the specified information.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: Campaign end date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Whether the campaign is currently active.

parent_id.title: Parent Id
parent_id.description: ID of the parent campaign if this is a child campaign.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Campaign start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

actual_cost.title: Actual Cost
actual_cost.description: Actual cost spent on the campaign.

description.title: Description
examples: This campaign targets new customers in the Northeast region
Q4 promotional campaign for existing customers

number_sent.title: Number Sent
number_sent.description: Number of individuals targeted by the campaign.

expected_response.title: Expected Response
expected_response.description: Expected response rate as a percentage.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_CAMPAIGN_RECORD_VIA_POST
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Creates a new campaign record in Salesforce; if 'ParentId' is provided, it must be a valid ID of an existing Campaign record, and if 'OwnerId' is provided, it must be a valid ID of an active User.

inputSchema.title: CreateCampaignRecordViaPostRequest

Id.title: Id
Id.description: Unique identifier for the campaign record, usually system-generated upon creation.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Required. Name of the campaign (limit 80 characters).

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Current status of the campaign (limit 40 characters).

EndDate.title: End Date
EndDate.description: Ending date for the campaign (YYYY-MM-DD); responses received after this date are still counted.

OwnerId.title: Owner Id
OwnerId.description: ID of the campaign owner. Defaults to the ID of the user making the API call.

IsActive.title: Is Active
IsActive.description: Indicates if the campaign is active. Label: Active.

ParentId.title: Parent Id
ParentId.description: ID of the parent Campaign record for hierarchical grouping.

IsDeleted.title: Is Deleted
IsDeleted.description: Indicates if the campaign record has been deleted.

ActualCost.title: Actual Cost
ActualCost.description: Actual cost of the campaign, in the organization's currency.

NumberSent.title: Number Sent
NumberSent.description: Total number of individuals targeted (e.g., emails sent). Label: Num Sent.

CreatedById.title: Created By Id
CreatedById.description: Read-only. ID of the user who created this campaign record.

Description.title: Description
examples: Annual summer promotional campaign targeting new and existing customers.
Launch campaign for the new X-series product line.
Description.description: Detailed description of the campaign (limit 32KB; first 255 characters displayed in reports).

BudgetedCost.title: Budgeted Cost
BudgetedCost.description: Budgeted cost for this campaign, in the organization's currency.

NumberOfLeads.title: Number Of Leads
NumberOfLeads.description: Read-only. Total leads associated with this campaign. Label: Leads in Campaign.

LastViewedDate.title: Last Viewed Date
LastViewedDate.description: Read-only. Timestamp of current user's last view of this record/list view (ISO 8601). Null if only accessed (see LastReferencedDate) but not viewed.

SystemModstamp.title: System Modstamp
SystemModstamp.description: Read-only. Last modification date and time by a user or automated process (ISO 8601).

ExpectedRevenue.title: Expected Revenue
ExpectedRevenue.description: Expected revenue from this campaign, in the organization's currency.

attributes__url.title: Attributes  Url
attributes__url.description: Read-only. Relative URL to the campaign record.

ExpectedResponse.title: Expected Response
ExpectedResponse.description: Percentage of responses expected from targeted individuals.

LastActivityDate.title: Last Activity Date
LastActivityDate.description: Read-only. Most recent activity date (event due date or closed task due date, YYYY-MM-DD).

LastModifiedById.title: Last Modified By Id
LastModifiedById.description: Read-only. ID of the user who last modified this campaign record.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Read-only. Last modification date and time (ISO 8601).

NumberOfContacts.title: Number Of Contacts
NumberOfContacts.description: Read-only. Total contacts associated with this campaign. Label: Total Contacts.

NumberOfResponses.title: Number Of Responses
NumberOfResponses.description: Read-only. Contacts and unconverted leads with Member Status “Responded”. Label: Responses in Campaign.

LastReferencedDate.title: Last Referenced Date
LastReferencedDate.description: Read-only. Timestamp of current user's last access to this record, a related record, or a list view (ISO 8601).

NumberOfOpportunities.title: Number Of Opportunities
NumberOfOpportunities.description: Read-only. Total opportunities associated with this campaign. Label: Opportunities in Campaign.

AmountAllOpportunities.title: Amount All Opportunities
AmountAllOpportunities.description: Read-only. Total monetary amount of all opportunities (including closed/won) in this campaign, in organization's currency. Label: Value Opportunities in Campaign.

AmountWonOpportunities.title: Amount Won Opportunities
AmountWonOpportunities.description: Read-only. Total monetary amount of closed/won opportunities in this campaign, in organization's currency. Label: Value Won Opportunities in Campaign.

NumberOfConvertedLeads.title: Number Of Converted Leads
NumberOfConvertedLeads.description: Read-only. Leads converted to an account and contact from this campaign. Label: Converted Leads.

NumberOfWonOpportunities.title: Number Of Won Opportunities
NumberOfWonOpportunities.description: Read-only. Closed or won opportunities from this campaign. Label: Won Opportunities in Campaign.

CampaignMemberRecordTypeId.title: Campaign Member Record Type Id
CampaignMemberRecordTypeId.description: Record type ID for associated CampaignMember records, determining their fields and layout.

inputSchema.description: Defines the fields for creating a new Salesforce Campaign record.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_CONTACT
tools.description: Creates a new contact in Salesforce with the specified information.

last_name.title: Last Name
last_name.description: Contact's last name (required field in Salesforce).

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: ID of the Account this contact is associated with.

description.title: Description
description.description: Additional notes or description about the contact.

lead_source.title: Lead Source
lead_source.description: Source from which this contact originated.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_LEAD
tools.description: Creates a new lead in Salesforce with the specified information.

company.title: Company
company.description: Lead's company name (required field in Salesforce).

last_name.title: Last Name
last_name.description: Lead's last name (required field in Salesforce).

description.title: Description
description.description: Additional notes or description about the lead.

number_of_employees.title: Number Of Employees
number_of_employees.description: Number of employees at lead's company.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_LEAD_WITH_SPECIFIED_CONTENT_TYPE
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Creates a new Lead in Salesforce, requiring `LastName` and `Company` unless person accounts are enabled and `Company` is null.

inputSchema.title: CreateLeadWithSpecifiedContentTypeRequest

State.title: State
State.description: State or province for the address.

Title.title: Title
Title.description: Title (e.g., CFO, CEO; up to 128 characters).

Jigsaw.title: Jigsaw
Jigsaw.description: Data.com contact ID (max 20 chars). Indicates Data.com import. Do not modify; for import troubleshooting.

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Current status (e.g., Open, Contacted). Defined in LeadStatus object in Salesforce setup.

Company.title: Company
Company.description: Company name (up to 255 characters). If person accounts are enabled and this is null, lead converts to a person account.

OwnerId.title: Owner Id
OwnerId.description: ID of the owner. Defaults to current user if unspecified.

Industry.title: Industry
Industry.description: Primary industry of the lead's company.

LastName.title: Last Name
LastName.description: Last name of the lead (up to 80 characters).

PhotoUrl.title: Photo Url
PhotoUrl.description: Path for social network profile image URL; used with Salesforce instance URL. Empty if Social Accounts/Contacts disabled.

IsDeleted.title: Is Deleted
IsDeleted.description: Indicates if the lead is in the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Salesforce defaults to false if this field is omitted.

PostalCode.title: Postal Code
PostalCode.description: Postal or ZIP code for the address.

Primary__c.title: Primary  C
Primary__c.description: Custom field, possibly indicates if primary contact/lead.

SICCode__c.title: Sic Code  C
SICCode__c.description: Custom field for Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code.

CleanStatus.title: Clean Status
CleanStatus.description: Record's clean status compared with Data.com (e.g., Matched, Different, Pending).

CreatedById.title: Created By Id
CreatedById.description: ID of user who created this. System-generated, read-only.

Description.title: Description
examples: Interested in product X, met at conference Y.

IsConverted.title: Is Converted
IsConverted.description: True if converted to Account/Contact/Opportunity; false otherwise. Read-only; set upon conversion.

IndividualId.title: Individual Id
IndividualId.description: Associated data privacy record ID. Available if Data Protection/Privacy enabled.

AnnualRevenue.title: Annual Revenue
AnnualRevenue.description: Annual revenue of the lead’s company.

ConvertedDate.title: Converted Date
ConvertedDate.description: Conversion date. Read-only; set upon conversion.

DandbCompanyId.title: Dandb Company Id
DandbCompanyId.description: Associated D&B Company record ID. Available if Data.com used.

LastViewedDate.title: Last Viewed Date
LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp when current user last viewed. Null if only accessed (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed. Read-only.

MasterRecordId.title: Master Record Id
MasterRecordId.description: ID of the master record if this lead was deleted due to a merge; null otherwise.

SystemModstamp.title: System Modstamp
SystemModstamp.description: Timestamp of last modification by user or system. System-generated, read-only.

IsUnreadByOwner.title: Is Unread By Owner
IsUnreadByOwner.description: True if assigned to an owner but not yet viewed by them. Salesforce defaults to true when a lead is created or its owner changes.

attributes__url.title: Attributes  Url
attributes__url.description: Relative URL of SObject record. Usually metadata, not set by user on creation.

EmailBouncedDate.title: Email Bounced Date
EmailBouncedDate.description: Date/time of last email bounce (if bounce management active).

IsPriorityRecord.title: Is Priority Record
IsPriorityRecord.description: True if this lead is marked as a priority record.

LastActivityDate.title: Last Activity Date
LastActivityDate.description: Later of most recent event's Due Date or most recently closed task's Due Date. Read-only.

LastModifiedById.title: Last Modified By Id
LastModifiedById.description: ID of user who last modified this. System-generated, read-only.

attributes__type.title: Attributes  Type
attributes__type.description: SObject type (typically 'Lead'). Usually metadata, not set by user on creation.

CompanyDunsNumber.title: Company Duns Number
CompanyDunsNumber.description: D-U-N-S number (unique 9-digit business ID; max 9 chars). Available if Data.com Prospector/Clean used.

NumberOfEmployees.title: Number Of Employees
NumberOfEmployees.description: Number of employees at the lead’s company.

ConvertedAccountId.title: Converted Account Id
ConvertedAccountId.description: ID of the Account object from conversion. Read-only.

ConvertedContactId.title: Converted Contact Id
ConvertedContactId.description: ID of the Contact object from conversion. Read-only.

EmailBouncedReason.title: Email Bounced Reason
EmailBouncedReason.description: Reason for last email bounce (if bounce management active).

LastReferencedDate.title: Last Referenced Date
LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp when current user last accessed this or related record. Read-only.

ProductInterest__c.title: Product Interest  C
ProductInterest__c.description: Custom field indicating the product(s) the lead is interested in.

CurrentGenerators__c.title: Current Generators  C
CurrentGenerators__c.description: Custom field for information about current generators or similar equipment/services.

NumberofLocations__c.title: Numberof Locations  C
NumberofLocations__c.description: Custom field for the number of locations the lead's company has.

ConvertedOpportunityId.title: Converted Opportunity Id
ConvertedOpportunityId.description: ID of the Opportunity from conversion. Read-only.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for creating a new Lead in Salesforce.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_NEW_CONTACT_WITH_JSON_HEADER
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Creates a new Contact in Salesforce; 'LastName' is required, an existing 'AccountId' must be used if provided, and any custom fields (ending with '__c') must be predefined.

inputSchema.title: CreateNewContactWithJsonHeaderRequest

Id.title: Id
Id.description: Unique contact identifier, system-generated; omit for new contact creation.

Fax.title: Fax
Fax.description: Primary business fax. Label: Business Fax.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Read-only: Full name, a concatenation of FirstName, MiddleName, LastName, and Suffix (up to 203 characters).

Phone.title: Phone
Phone.description: Primary business phone. Label: Business Phone.

Jigsaw.title: Jigsaw
Jigsaw.description: Read-only: Data.com Company ID (max 20 chars), indicates import from Data.com. Label: Data.com Key. Do not modify.

OwnerId.title: Owner Id
OwnerId.description: ID of the Salesforce user owning this contact. Defaults to the logged-in user if unspecified.

LastName.title: Last Name
LastName.description: Required: Contact's last name (up to 80 characters).

Level__c.title: Level  C
Level__c.description: Custom field: Contact's level (e.g., Primary, Secondary). '__c' denotes a custom field.

PhotoUrl.title: Photo Url
PhotoUrl.description: Read-only: Path for social profile image URL (redirects). Empty if Social Accounts & Contacts disabled.

AccountId.title: Account Id
AccountId.description: Parent Account ID; must exist if specified. Caution advised when changing for portal-enabled contacts.

Birthdate.title: Birthdate
Birthdate.description: Birthdate (YYYY-MM-DD). SOQL queries ignore year for date comparisons (e.g., `Birthdate > TODAY`).

IsDeleted.title: Is Deleted
IsDeleted.description: Read-only: True if contact is in Recycle Bin. Label: Deleted.

LeadSource.title: Lead Source
LeadSource.description: Lead source for this contact (e.g., Web, Phone Inquiry).

Salutation.title: Salutation
Salutation.description: Honorific for the contact's name (e.g., Dr., Mr., Mrs.).

CleanStatus.title: Clean Status
CleanStatus.description: Record's clean status compared to Data.com (e.g., 'Matched' may appear as 'In Sync' in UI).

CreatedById.title: Created By Id
CreatedById.description: Read-only: ID of user who created contact.

ReportsToId.title: Reports To Id
ReportsToId.description: ID of manager contact reports to. Not for person accounts (IsPersonAccount true).

IndividualId.title: Individual Id
IndividualId.description: ID of associated data privacy record. Available if Data Protection & Privacy enabled.

Languages__c.title: Languages  C
Languages__c.description: Custom field: Languages spoken by the contact (e.g., English;Spanish). '__c' denotes a custom field.

ContactSource.title: Contact Source
ContactSource.description: Source of contact information, for more granular tracking than LeadSource.

OtherLatitude.title: Other Latitude
OtherLatitude.description: Alternate address: Latitude (-90 to 90, 15 decimal places). Use with OtherLongitude.

IsEmailBounced.title: Is Email Bounced
IsEmailBounced.description: True if email bounced; bounce management must be active.

LastViewedDate.title: Last Viewed Date
LastViewedDate.description: Read-only: Timestamp current user last viewed contact. Null if only referenced.

MasterRecordId.title: Master Record Id
MasterRecordId.description: Read-only: ID of the master record post-merge deletion; null otherwise.

OtherLongitude.title: Other Longitude
OtherLongitude.description: Alternate address: Longitude (-180 to 180, 15 decimal places). Use with OtherLatitude.

SystemModstamp.title: System Modstamp

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_NOTE

body.title: Body
examples: Discussed product features and pricing. Customer is interested in premium plan.
Called customer at 2pm. They requested a follow-up next week.
Important: Contract expires on Dec 31st. Need to start renewal discussions.
body.description: Body/content of the note. Can contain detailed text information.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the note (required field in Salesforce).

owner_id.title: Owner Id
owner_id.description: ID of the user who will own the note. Defaults to the current user if not specified.

parent_id.title: Parent Id
parent_id.description: ID of the record to attach the note to (required field in Salesforce). Can be any record that supports notes like Account, Contact, Lead, Opportunity, etc.

is_private.title: Is Private
is_private.description: Whether the note should be private (only visible to owner and users with Modify All Data permission).

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_NOTE_RECORD_WITH_CONTENT_TYPE_HEADER
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Creates a new Note record in Salesforce, associated with an existing Salesforce object via `ParentId`, automatically including a `Content-Type: application/json` header.

inputSchema.title: CreateNoteRecordWithContentTypeHeaderRequest

Id.title: Id
Id.description: Unique identifier for the Note object, typically auto-generated and not provided in the request.

Body.title: Body
examples: Detailed notes from the meeting held on 2023-10-26.
Action items: 1. Send follow-up email. 2. Schedule next meeting.
Body.description: Content or body of the note.

OwnerId.title: Owner Id
OwnerId.description: ID of the Salesforce User who will own the note; defaults to the API user.

ParentId.title: Parent Id
ParentId.description: ID of the parent Salesforce record (e.g., Account, Contact) to which this note is related; must reference an existing record.

IsDeleted.title: Is Deleted
IsDeleted.description: Indicates if the object is in the Recycle Bin. Label is Deleted.

IsPrivate.title: Is Private

CreatedById.title: Created By Id
CreatedById.description: ID of the user who created the note (system-generated, read-only on create).

CreatedDate.title: Created Date
CreatedDate.description: Timestamp of note creation (system-generated, read-only on create).

attributes__url.title: Attributes  Url

LastModifiedById.title: Last Modified By Id

attributes__type.title: Attributes  Type

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_OPPORTUNITY

next_step.title: Next Step
next_step.description: Description of next step in sales process.

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: ID of the Account this opportunity is associated with.

close_date.title: Close Date
close_date.description: Expected close date in YYYY-MM-DD format (required field in Salesforce).

contact_id.title: Contact Id
contact_id.description: ID of the primary Contact for this opportunity.

stage_name.title: Stage Name
stage_name.description: Current stage of the opportunity (required field in Salesforce).

description.title: Description
examples: Large enterprise deal for cloud migration
Expanding existing contract to include new products

pricebook2_id.title: Pricebook2 Id
pricebook2_id.description: ID of the price book for this opportunity.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_OPPORTUNITY_RECORD
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Creates a new Opportunity record in Salesforce; `Name`, `StageName`, and `CloseDate` are mandatory, and ensure any referenced IDs (e.g., `AccountId`, `CampaignId`) are valid and corresponding Salesforce features are enabled if used.

inputSchema.title: CreateOpportunityRecordRequest

Id.title: Id
Id.description: System-generated unique identifier. Typically not provided during creation; providing it may be ignored or cause an error.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Descriptive name for the opportunity. Required. Limit: 120 characters.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Opportunity type (e.g., 'New Business', 'Existing Customer'). Values depend on Salesforce configuration.

IsWon.title: Is Won
IsWon.description: Read-only. Indicates if won, lost, or open. Auto-set by Salesforce based on StageName; cannot be set on creation.

Amount.title: Amount
Amount.description: Estimated total sale amount. If products are involved, this may be auto-calculated, and direct updates might be ignored.

Fiscal.title: Fiscal
Fiscal.description: Fiscal period ('YYYY Q' format, e.g., '2024 1') based on CloseDate. Used if standard fiscal year settings not enabled. Often auto-derived.

OwnerId.title: Owner Id
OwnerId.description: ID of the User owning this opportunity. Defaults to creating user if unspecified (depending on settings). Ensure User ID is valid and active.

IsClosed.title: Is Closed
IsClosed.description: Read-only. Indicates if closed or open. Auto-set by Salesforce based on StageName; cannot be set on creation.

NextStep.title: Next Step
examples: Schedule follow-up meeting for next week
NextStep.description: Next actionable step towards closing. Limit: 255 characters.

AccountId.title: Account Id
AccountId.description: ID of the linked Account. Often crucial for creating a valid opportunity.

ContactId.title: Contact Id
ContactId.description: ID of the primary Contact. Set only during creation. Use OpportunityContactRole object to modify or add other contacts later.

IsDeleted.title: Is Deleted
IsDeleted.description: Indicates if the record is in the Recycle Bin. Generally used for querying, not set during creation.

IsPrivate.title: Is Private
IsPrivate.description: If true, this opportunity is private and only visible to the owner and users with appropriate sharing access.

PushCount.title: Push Count
PushCount.description: Read-only. Used internally by Salesforce for mobile sync updates. Not user-settable.

StageName.title: Stage Name
StageName.description: Current stage (e.g., 'Prospecting', 'Closed Won'). Required. May update ForecastCategoryName, IsClosed, IsWon, and Probability. Query OpportunityStage object or refer to Salesforce setup for valid names.

CampaignId.title: Campaign Id
CampaignId.description: ID of the influencing Campaign. Ensure Campaign feature is enabled and ID is valid.

FiscalYear.title: Fiscal Year
FiscalYear.description: Fiscal year (e.g., 2024) of CloseDate. Often auto-derived from CloseDate based on org's fiscal year settings.

LeadSource.title: Lead Source
LeadSource.description: Lead or opportunity source (e.g., 'Web', 'Partner Referral'). Values depend on Salesforce configuration.

CreatedById.title: Created By Id
CreatedById.description: Read-only. ID of the user who created this record. Auto-set by Salesforce.

CreatedDate.title: Created Date
CreatedDate.description: Read-only. Creation timestamp. Auto-set by Salesforce.

Description.title: Description
examples: Initial discussion with CEO, strong interest in enterprise package.
Follow-up to demo, client requests proposal.

Probability.title: Probability
Probability.description: Likelihood (percentage, e.g., 75 for 75%) of closing. Often implied by StageName but can be overridden.

Pricebook2Id.title: Pricebook2 Id
Pricebook2Id.description: ID of the associated Price Book (Pricebook2). Generally required if adding products. Ensure products/price books are enabled and ID is valid.

FiscalQuarter.title: Fiscal Quarter
FiscalQuarter.description: Fiscal quarter (1-4) of CloseDate. Often auto-derived from CloseDate based on org's fiscal year settings.

HasOverdueTask.title: Has Overdue Task
HasOverdueTask.description: Read-only. Indicates if overdue Tasks exist. API v35.0+.

LastViewedDate.title: Last Viewed Date
LastViewedDate.description: Read-only. Timestamp of when current user last viewed this record. Not settable on creation.

SystemModstamp.title: System Modstamp
SystemModstamp.description: Read-only. Last system modification timestamp. Auto-set by Salesforce.

ExpectedRevenue.title: Expected Revenue
ExpectedRevenue.description: Read-only. Calculated as Amount * Probability. Cannot be set during creation.

HasOpenActivity.title: Has Open Activity
HasOpenActivity.description: Read-only. Indicates if open activities (Events or Tasks) exist. API v35.0+.

attributes__url.title: Attributes  Url
attributes__url.description: Relative URL for this Opportunity record.

ForecastCategory.title: Forecast Category
ForecastCategory.description: Forecast category (e.g., 'Pipeline', 'Best Case'). Often implied by StageName. For API v12.0+, typically set via ForecastCategoryName. Values depend on Salesforce configuration.

LastActivityDate.title: Last Activity Date
LastActivityDate.description: Read-only. Date of the most recent activity (Event or Task). Not settable on creation.

LastModifiedById.title: Last Modified By Id
LastModifiedById.description: Read-only. ID of the user who last modified this record. Auto-set by Salesforce.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Read-only. Last modification timestamp. Auto-set by Salesforce.

attributes__type.title: Attributes  Type
attributes__type.description: SObject type for this record, typically 'Opportunity'.

LastReferencedDate.title: Last Referenced Date
LastReferencedDate.description: Read-only. Timestamp of when current user last accessed this record or a related one. Not settable on creation.

LastStageChangeDate.title: Last Stage Change Date
LastStageChangeDate.description: Read-only. Timestamp of last StageName change. Auto-set by Salesforce.

CurrentGenerators__c.title: Current Generators  C
CurrentGenerators__c.description: Custom field: Information on current generators.

ForecastCategoryName.title: Forecast Category Name
ForecastCategoryName.description: Name of the forecast category (e.g., 'Pipeline'). API v12.0+. Often implied by StageName but can be overridden. Typically determines ForecastCategory.

HasOpportunityLineItem.title: Has Opportunity Line Item
HasOpportunityLineItem.description: Read-only. Indicates if associated line items (products) exist. System-managed; ignored during creation.

TotalOpportunityQuantity.title: Total Opportunity Quantity
TotalOpportunityQuantity.description: Total quantity of items (e.g., units, licenses). Used in quantity-based forecasting.

LastAmountChangedHistoryId.title: Last Amount Changed History Id
LastAmountChangedHistoryId.description: Read-only. ID of OpportunityHistory record tracking last Amount change (API v50.0+). Not settable on creation.

DeliveryInstallationStatus__c.title: Delivery Installation Status  C
DeliveryInstallationStatus__c.description: Custom field: Delivery or installation status.

LastCloseDateChangedHistoryId.title: Last Close Date Changed History Id
LastCloseDateChangedHistoryId.description: Read-only. ID of OpportunityHistory record tracking last CloseDate change (API v50.0+). Not settable on creation.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for creating a new Salesforce Opportunity record.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_LIST_ACCOUNTS
tools.description: Lists accounts from Salesforce using SOQL query, allowing flexible filtering, sorting, and field selection.

query.title: Query
query.default: SELECT Id, Name, Type, Industry, Phone, Website, BillingCity, ShippingCity, AnnualRevenue, NumberOfEmployees FROM Account
examples: SELECT Id, Name FROM Account WHERE Type = 'Customer'
SELECT Id, Name, Industry FROM Account WHERE Industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY Name
SELECT Id, Name, AnnualRevenue FROM Account WHERE AnnualRevenue > 1000000 LIMIT 10
query.description: SOQL query to fetch accounts. Use standard SOQL syntax to filter, sort, and limit results.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_LIST_CAMPAIGNS
tools.description: Lists campaigns from Salesforce using SOQL query, allowing flexible filtering, sorting, and field selection.

query.title: Query
query.default: SELECT Id, Name, Type, Status, StartDate, EndDate, BudgetedCost, ActualCost, ExpectedRevenue, IsActive, ParentId FROM Campaign
examples: SELECT Id, Name, Type, Status FROM Campaign WHERE IsActive = true
SELECT Id, Name, StartDate, EndDate FROM Campaign ORDER BY StartDate DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT Id, Name, BudgetedCost FROM Campaign WHERE Type = 'Email' AND Status = 'In Progress'
query.description: SOQL query to fetch campaigns. Use standard SOQL syntax to filter, sort, and limit results.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_LIST_CONTACTS
tools.description: Lists contacts from Salesforce using SOQL query, allowing flexible filtering, sorting, and field selection.

query.title: Query
query.default: SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, Title, Department, AccountId FROM Contact
examples: SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName FROM Contact WHERE Email != null
SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Email FROM Contact ORDER BY LastName LIMIT 10
SELECT Id, Name, Email FROM Contact WHERE CreatedDate = TODAY
query.description: SOQL query to fetch contacts. Use standard SOQL syntax to filter, sort, and limit results.

search_term.title: Search Term

include_body.title: Include Body
include_body.description: Whether to include the template body content in results. Note: This may increase response size significantly.

template_type.title: Template Type
template_type.description: Filter by template type. Common values: text, custom, html, visualforce.

is_active_only.title: Is Active Only
is_active_only.description: Whether to return only active templates. Set to false to include inactive templates.

order_direction.title: Order Direction
order_direction.description: Sort direction: ASC for ascending, DESC for descending.

examples: SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Company FROM Lead WHERE Status = 'New'
SELECT Id, Name, Email, Company FROM Lead ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT Id, Name, Rating FROM Lead WHERE Rating = 'Hot' AND Industry = 'Technology'
query.description: SOQL query to fetch leads. Use standard SOQL syntax to filter, sort, and limit results.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_LIST_NOTES
tools.description: Lists notes from Salesforce using SOQL query, allowing flexible filtering, sorting, and field selection.

query.title: Query
query.default: SELECT Id, Title, Body, IsPrivate, ParentId, OwnerId, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate FROM Note
examples: SELECT Id, Title FROM Note WHERE ParentId = '001XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX'

SELECT Id, Title, ParentId FROM Note WHERE OwnerId = '005XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX' LIMIT 10

query.description: SOQL query to fetch notes. Use standard SOQL syntax to filter, sort, and limit results.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_LIST_OPPORTUNITIES

examples: SELECT Id, Name, Amount FROM Opportunity WHERE StageName = 'Closed Won'
SELECT Id, Name, CloseDate FROM Opportunity ORDER BY CloseDate DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT Id, Name, Amount FROM Opportunity WHERE Amount > 50000 AND CloseDate = THIS_QUARTER
query.description: SOQL query to fetch opportunities. Use standard SOQL syntax to filter, sort, and limit results.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_LIST_PRICEBOOK_ENTRIES

SELECT Id, ProductCode, Product2.Name, UnitPrice FROM PricebookEntry WHERE Product2.Name LIKE '%Widget%' ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC
query.description: SOQL query to fetch pricebook entries. Use standard SOQL syntax to filter, sort, and limit results.

what_id.description: ID of the related record (Account, Opportunity, Case, etc.) associated with the call.

comments.title: Comments
examples: Discussed product features and pricing. Customer interested in premium plan.
Resolved technical issue with login. Customer satisfied.
comments.description: Detailed notes or description of what was discussed during the call.

call_date.title: Call Date
call_date.description: Date of the call in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to today if not specified.

call_disposition.title: Call Disposition
call_disposition.description: Outcome or result of the call.

call_duration_seconds.title: Call Duration Seconds
call_duration_seconds.description: Duration of the call in seconds.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_LOG_EMAIL_ACTIVITY
tools.description: Creates an EmailMessage record to log email activity in Salesforce, associating it with related records.

html_body.title: Html Body
html_body.description: HTML body of the email. If provided, takes precedence over text_body for display.

parent_id.title: Parent Id
parent_id.description: ID of the parent record, typically a Case for case-related emails.

text_body.title: Text Body
examples: Thank you for your time today. Please find the attached proposal.
As discussed, here are the product specifications you requested.
text_body.description: Plain text body of the email.

to_address.title: To Address
to_address.description: Email addresses of the recipients (comma-separated if multiple).

is_incoming.title: Is Incoming
is_incoming.description: Whether this is an incoming email (true) or outgoing email (false).

message_date.title: Message Date
message_date.description: Date/time the email was sent in ISO format. Defaults to current time if not provided.

related_to_id.title: Related To Id
related_to_id.description: ID of the record to associate this email with (Account, Opportunity, Case, etc.).

is_client_managed.title: Is Client Managed
is_client_managed.description: Whether the email is client-managed (not sent through Salesforce).

is_externally_visible.title: Is Externally Visible
is_externally_visible.description: Whether the email is visible in customer portals/communities.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_MASS_TRANSFER_OWNERSHIP
tools.description: Transfers ownership of multiple records to a new owner in a single operation using Salesforce's composite API for better performance.

record_ids.title: Record Ids
record_ids.description: List of record IDs to transfer ownership.

object_type.title: Object Type
object_type.description: The Salesforce object type for the records to transfer (e.g., Account, Contact, Lead, Opportunity).

new_owner_id.title: New Owner Id
new_owner_id.description: The user ID of the new owner to transfer records to.

send_notification_email.title: Send Notification Email
send_notification_email.description: Whether to send email notification to the new owner about the transfer.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_QUERY_CONTACTS_BY_NAME
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Finds Salesforce Contact records by name using a case-insensitive search.

inputSchema.title: QueryContactsByNameRequest

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of contact records to return.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Comma-separated list of Salesforce Contact object field API names to retrieve. Common field API names include: Id, Name, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, MobilePhone, Title, AccountId.

contact_name.title: Contact Name
contact_name.description: The name or partial name to search for within the 'Name' field of Salesforce Contact records. Supports partial matches (e.g., 'John' will find 'John Smith', 'John Doe', etc.).

inputSchema.description: Request schema for `QueryContactsByName`

tools.name: SALESFORCE_QUERY_REPORT
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Executes a Salesforce report synchronously by its `id` and `reportType`, optionally with dynamic ad-hoc adjustments like filters or groupings, and returns its data without modifying the saved report.

inputSchema.title: QueryReportRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the report to query.

name.title: Name
name.description: The display name of the report. This is typically used for display purposes and may not be unique.

items.title: ChartSetting

title.title: Title
title.description: The title to be displayed for the chart.

chartType.title: Chart Type
chartType.description: The type of chart to display for the report.

groupings.title: Groupings
groupings.description: Specifies the report grouping to be used for the chart, if applicable.

hasLegend.title: Has Legend
hasLegend.description: Specifies if the chart should display a legend (true) or not (false).

summaries.title: Summaries
summaries.description: List of unique identifiers for summary or custom summary formula fields to be displayed in the chart. Examples: 'a!Amount' (average of Amount), 's!Amount' (sum of Amount), 'm!Amount' (minimum Amount), 'x!Amount' (maximum Amount), 's!<customfieldID>' (sum of a custom field). For custom fields and custom report types, the identity is a combination of the summary type and the field ID.

showChartValues.title: Show Chart Values
showChartValues.description: Determines if the chart should display values (e.g., on bars or points) (true) or not (false).

summaryAxisLocations.title: Summary Axis Locations
summaryAxisLocations.description: Specifies the axis (X or Y) on which the summary values are shown in the chart.

items.description: Configuration for a chart displayed with the report.

chart.title: Chart
chart.description: Configuration for the chart to be displayed with the report, if any.

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: Defines the scope of the data on which you run the report. For example, you can run the report against all opportunities, opportunities you own, or opportunities your team owns. Valid values depend on the report type.

sortBy.title: Sort By
sortBy.description: A list of dictionaries specifying the columns and direction for sorting the report data. Each dictionary should define 'column' (API name) and 'sortOrder' ('asc' or 'desc').

items.title: BucketField

label.title: Label
label.description: The user-facing display label for the bucket field.

items.title: BucketFieldValue

label.title: Label
label.description: The user-facing display name for this bucket value or category.

rangeUpperBound.title: Range Upper Bound
rangeUpperBound.description: The upper boundary for the range of values included in this bucket category. Applicable for buckets of type NUMBER.

sourceDimensionValues.title: Source Dimension Values
sourceDimensionValues.description: A list of raw values from the source field that are grouped into this bucket category. Applicable for buckets of type PICKLIST and TEXT.

items.description: A specific value or category within a bucket field.

values.title: Values
values.description: A list of specific value groupings (BucketFieldValue) within this bucket field.

bucketType.title: Bucket Type
bucketType.description: The data type of the bucket field. Determines how values are grouped.

developerName.title: Developer Name
developerName.description: The unique API developer name for the bucket field.

otherBucketLabel.title: Other Bucket Label
otherBucketLabel.description: The label for the catch-all 'Other' category, used when `bucketType` is PICKLIST and not all source values are explicitly bucketed.

sourceColumnName.title: Source Column Name
sourceColumnName.description: The API name of the source report column that this bucket field is based on.

nullTreatedAsZero.title: Null Treated As Zero
nullTreatedAsZero.description: Indicates if null input values should be treated as zero (true) when bucketing, or remain as null (false).

items.description: A field that groups data from a source column into categories (buckets).

buckets.title: Buckets
buckets.description: A list of bucket field definitions to apply to the report.

topRows.title: TopRows

rowLimit.title: Row Limit
rowLimit.description: The maximum number of rows to return in the report (e.g., top 10).

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: The sort direction (e.g., 'ASC' or 'DESC') applied to the primary sort column when limiting the number of rows using `rowLimit`.

topRows.description: Limits report output to a specified number of top or bottom rows.

division.title: Division
division.description: Determines the division of records to include in the report (e.g., West Coast, East Coast). Available only if your organization uses divisions to segment data and you have the 'Affected by Divisions' permission. If you do not have this permission, reports include records in all divisions.

folderId.title: Folder Id
folderId.description: The ID of the folder where the report is stored. Necessary if identifying the report by `developerName` within a specific folder.

aggregates.title: Aggregates
aggregates.description: List of aggregate field identifiers to include in the report (e.g., sum of Amount as 's!Amount', average of Amount as 'a!Amount').

reportType.title: Report Type

type.title: Type
type.description: The unique API identifier for the report type.

label.title: Label
label.description: The display name of the report type.

reportType.description: Specifies the type of the report, including its unique API name (`type`) and display name (`label`). This defines the objects and fields available for reporting.

items.title: CrossFilter
ReportFilter

value.title: Value
value.description: The value used for filtering the specified column. For datetime fields, providing only a date (e.g., '2015-08-08') may result in a default time being applied based on GMT and your timezone (e.g., '2015-08-08T07:00:00Z' if timezone is PST/GMT-7).

column.title: Column
column.description: The unique API name of the report column to which this filter is applied.

operator.title: Operator
operator.description: Condition used to filter a field (e.g., equals, greaterThan); available operators depend on field data type.

filterType.title: Filter Type
filterType.description:
Describes the type of value used to filter report data. Valid values are:
fieldToField—Filters report data by comparing values of one field with the values of a second field.
fieldValue—Filters report data by comparing values of a field with a defined value.
null—If null, the filterType defaults to fieldValue.

isRunPageEditable.title: Is Run Page Editable
isRunPageEditable.description: Specifies if this filter can be edited by users on the report run page (true) or not (false).

items.description: A filter condition to apply to report data.

criteria.title: Criteria
criteria.description: A list of `ReportFilter` objects that define the conditions for filtering the `relatedEntity`.

relatedEntity.title: Related Entity
relatedEntity.description: The API name of the related object being filtered against (e.g., Opportunity for an Account report cross-filtered with Opportunities).

includesObject.title: Includes Object
includesObject.description: If true, the report includes primary entity records that HAVE corresponding related entity records meeting the criteria. If false (a 'without' filter), includes primary records that DO NOT HAVE such related records.

primaryEntityField.title: Primary Entity Field
primaryEntityField.description: The API name of the field on the primary object that links to the `relatedEntity`.

relatedEntityJoinField.title: Related Entity Join Field
relatedEntityJoinField.description: The API name of the field on the `relatedEntity` used to join with the `primaryEntityField`.

items.description: A cross-object filter to include/exclude records based on related object criteria.

crossFilters.title: Cross Filters
crossFilters.description: A list of cross-object filters to apply to the report.

reportFormat.title: Report Format
reportFormat.description: The desired format for the report output. Determines the structure of the data returned.

detailColumns.title: Detail Columns
detailColumns.description: A list of API names of the columns to include in the detail section of the report.

developerName.title: Developer Name
developerName.description: The unique API developer name of the report being queried. This is often used to identify a saved report definition.

items.title: GroupingsDown

name.title: Name
name.description: The API name of the field used for row-based grouping in the report.

sortOrder.title: Sort Order
sortOrder.description: Specifies the sort order for data within this row grouping.

sortAggregate.title: Sort Aggregate
sortAggregate.description: Summary field that’s used to sort data within a grouping in a report that’s in summary format. Applies if you have the Aggregate Sort feature enabled as part of its pilot program. The value is null when data within a grouping is not sorted by a summary field. In this example, data grouped by Account Owner is sorted by the sum of Annual Revenue.

dateGranularity.title: Date Granularity
dateGranularity.description:
Interval set on a date field that’s used as a row grouping. Value can be:
Day
Calendar Week
Calendar Month
Calendar Quarter
Calendar Year
Fiscal Quarter
Fiscal Year
Calendar Month in Year
Calendar Day in Month

items.description: Row-based grouping criteria for the report.

groupingsDown.title: Groupings Down
groupingsDown.description: A list of field groupings to be applied down rows (for summary or matrix reports).

hasDetailRows.title: Has Detail Rows
hasDetailRows.description: If true, the report output will include individual record rows (detail rows). If false, only summary data is returned.

items.title: ReportFilter

value.title: Value
value.description: The value used for filtering the specified column. For datetime fields, providing only a date (e.g., '2015-08-08') may result in a default time being applied based on GMT and your timezone (e.g., '2015-08-08T07:00:00Z' if timezone is PST/GMT-7).

column.title: Column
column.description: The unique API name of the report column to which this filter is applied.

operator.title: Operator
operator.description: Condition used to filter a field (e.g., equals, greaterThan); available operators depend on field data type.

filterType.title: Filter Type
filterType.description:
Describes the type of value used to filter report data. Valid values are:
fieldToField—Filters report data by comparing values of one field with the values of a second field.
fieldValue—Filters report data by comparing values of a field with a defined value.
null—If null, the filterType defaults to fieldValue.

isRunPageEditable.title: Is Run Page Editable
isRunPageEditable.description: Specifies if this filter can be edited by users on the report run page (true) or not (false).

items.description: A filter condition to apply to report data.

reportFilters.title: Report Filters
reportFilters.description: A list of filter conditions to apply to the report data. Each filter specifies a column, operator, and value.

showSubtotals.title: Show Subtotals
showSubtotals.description: If true, the report output will include subtotals for groupings.

hasRecordCount.title: Has Record Count
hasRecordCount.description: If true, the report will display the total number of records.

showGrandTotal.title: Show Grand Total
showGrandTotal.description: If true, the report output will include a grand total summary.

items.title: GroupingAcross

name.title: Name
name.description: The API name of the field used for column-based grouping (matrix reports).

sortOrder.title: Sort Order
sortOrder.description: Specifies the sort order for data within this column grouping.

dateGranularity.title: Date Granularity
dateGranularity.description:
Interval set on a date field used as a column grouping. Value can be:
Day
Calendar Week
Calendar Month
Calendar Quarter
Calendar Year
Fiscal Quarter
Fiscal Year
Calendar Month in Year
Calendar Day in Month

items.description: Column-based grouping criteria for matrix reports.

groupingsAcross.title: Groupings Across
groupingsAcross.description: A list of field groupings to be applied across columns (for matrix reports).

standardFilters.title: Standard Filters
standardFilters.description: A list of standard filters to apply, typically specific to the `reportType`. Each filter is a dictionary with 'name' and 'value' string pairs.

standardDateFilter.title: StandardDateFilter

column.title: Column
column.description: The API name of the date field used for the standard date filter.

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: The end date for a custom date range filter. Used when `durationValue` is 'CUSTOM'. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: The start date for a custom date range filter. Used when `durationValue` is 'CUSTOM'. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

durationValue.title: Duration Value
durationValue.description: The predefined date range or 'CUSTOM' to specify a custom range using startDate and endDate.

standardDateFilter.description: A filter based on a standard or custom date range for a specific date field.

items.title: CustomDetailFormula

label.title: Label
label.description: The user-facing display label for this row-level formula column.

formula.title: Formula
formula.description: The formula expression to be evaluated for each row. Can reference most report type fields, excluding bucketed and historical tracking fields.

description.title: Description
description.description: An optional user-defined description for this row-level formula.

formulaType.title: Formula Type
formulaType.description: The data type of the result produced by the formula. Valid types include: date, datetime, number, text.

decimalPlaces.title: Decimal Places
decimalPlaces.description: Number of decimal places for numeric formula results. Required for numeric types, not applicable for others.

items.description: A row-level formula calculated for each detail row in the report.

customDetailFormula.title: Custom Detail Formula
customDetailFormula.description: A list of row-level (custom detail) formula definitions for the report.

historicalColumns.title: Historical Columns

showChanges.title: Show Changes
showChanges.description: If true, displays a separate column showing the change in value for the corresponding historical column.

decreaseIsPositive.title: Decrease Is Positive
decreaseIsPositive.description: If true, a decrease in value for a historical column is displayed as a positive change (e.g., in green); otherwise, it's displayed as negative (e.g., in red).

historicalColumns.description: Specifies presentation options for historical tracking columns in the report.

hasStackedSummaries.title: Has Stacked Summaries
hasStackedSummaries.description: If true, stacked summaries are enabled for display in the report.

reportBooleanFilter.title: Report Boolean Filter
reportBooleanFilter.description: A string defining the logical relationship between multiple `reportFilters`. Uses 1-based indexing for filters (e.g., '(1 AND 2) OR 3').

items.title: CustomSummaryFormula

label.title: Label
label.description: The user-facing display label for the custom summary formula.

formula.title: Formula
formula.description: The formula expression defining the calculations for the custom summary. Typically involves aggregate functions.

downGroup.title: Down Group
downGroup.description: The API name of a specific row grouping to apply this formula to, if `downGroupType` is CUSTOM. Otherwise, null.

acrossGroup.title: Across Group
acrossGroup.description: The API name of a specific column grouping to apply this formula to, if `acrossGroupType` is CUSTOM. Otherwise, null.

description.title: Description
description.description: An optional user-defined description for the custom summary formula.

formulaType.title: Formula Type
formulaType.description: The data type and format of the result from the custom summary formula.

decimalPlaces.title: Decimal Places
decimalPlaces.description: Number of decimal places to display for numeric, currency, or percent formula results.

downGroupType.title: Down Group Type
downGroupType.description: Specifies the row grouping level at which this summary formula is calculated and displayed.

acrossGroupType.title: Across Group Type
acrossGroupType.description: Specifies the column grouping level at which this summary formula is calculated and displayed.

items.description: A formula that calculates aggregate values at summary levels.

customSummaryFormula.title: Custom Summary Formula
customSummaryFormula.description: A list of custom summary formula definitions for the report.

historicalSnapshotDates.title: Historical Snapshot Dates
historicalSnapshotDates.description: A list of dates for which historical trending data should be retrieved. Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD format.

userOrHierarchyFilterId.title: User Or Hierarchy Filter Id
userOrHierarchyFilterId.description: The ID of a user or role used to filter the report based on role hierarchy (e.g., 'My Team's Opportunities').

allowedInCustomDetailFormula.title: Allowed In Custom Detail Formula
allowedInCustomDetailFormula.description: Indicates if fields used in the report are allowed in custom detail formulas.

inputSchema.description: Defines the request parameters for querying a Salesforce report.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_REMOVE_ACCOUNT_BY_UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Deletes an existing Salesforce Account using its unique ID, returning an empty response on success (HTTP 204).

inputSchema.title: RemoveAccountByUniqueIdentifierRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique Salesforce Account ID (typically 15 or 18 characters).

inputSchema.description: Input to remove a Salesforce Account by its unique identifier.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_REMOVE_A_SPECIFIC_CONTACT_BY_ID
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Permanently deletes a specific Contact from Salesforce using its unique ID, which must correspond to an existing record.

inputSchema.title: RemoveASpecificContactByIdRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the Contact object to be deleted. This is a required path parameter. Salesforce IDs are typically 15-character case-sensitive or 18-character case-insensitive.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a specific Contact by its unique Salesforce ID.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_REMOVE_CAMPAIGN_OBJECT_BY_ID
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Permanently deletes a specific Campaign SObject in Salesforce using its unique ID.

inputSchema.title: RemoveCampaignObjectByIdRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique Salesforce identifier (typically 18-character) of the Campaign SObject to be deleted.

inputSchema.description: Defines the structure for the request to remove a Campaign object by its ID.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_REMOVE_FROM_CAMPAIGN
tools.description: Removes a lead or contact from a campaign by deleting the CampaignMember record. Provide either the member_id (lead/contact ID) or the specific campaign_member_id.

member_id.title: Member Id
member_id.description: The Salesforce ID of the lead or contact to remove from the campaign. Either member_id or campaign_member_id must be provided.

campaign_id.title: Campaign Id
campaign_id.description: The Salesforce ID of the campaign to remove the member from.

campaign_member_id.title: Campaign Member Id
campaign_member_id.description: The specific CampaignMember record ID to delete. Either member_id or campaign_member_id must be provided.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_REMOVE_NOTE_OBJECT_BY_ID
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Permanently deletes an existing Salesforce Note object identified by its unique ID.

inputSchema.title: RemoveNoteObjectByIdRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique 15-character or 18-character Salesforce ID of the Note object to be deleted.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a Salesforce Note object by its unique identifier.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_REMOVE_OPPORTUNITY_BY_ID
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Permanently deletes an existing Salesforce Opportunity by its ID; if the Opportunity does not exist, a 'not found' (404) error occurs.

inputSchema.title: RemoveOpportunityByIdRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the Salesforce Opportunity to be deleted, e.g., '001R0000005hDFYIA2'.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a Salesforce Opportunity by its ID.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_RETRIEVE_ACCOUNT_DATA_AND_ERROR_RESPONSES
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Retrieves comprehensive metadata for the Salesforce Account sObject, detailing its properties, recent records, and related resource URLs.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveAccountDataAndErrorResponsesRequest
inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving metadata about the Salesforce Account sObject. This action does not require any request parameters.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_RETRIEVE_CAMPAIGN_DATA_WITH_ERROR_HANDLING
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Retrieves comprehensive information and metadata for the Salesforce Campaign sObject, provided it is enabled and accessible in the organization, and features robust error handling.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveCampaignDataWithErrorHandlingRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving comprehensive information about the Salesforce Campaign sObject. No input parameters are required for this action.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_RETRIEVE_CONTACT_INFO_WITH_STANDARD_RESPONSES
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Retrieves comprehensive metadata (e.g., fields, data types, picklist values) for the Salesforce Contact SObject; this action does not retrieve individual contact records.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveContactInfoWithStandardResponsesRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for the action to retrieve metadata of the Salesforce Contact SObject. No input parameters are required for this action.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_RETRIEVE_LEAD_BY_ID
tools.description: Retrieves details for a Salesforce Lead by its ID; the specified Lead ID must exist in Salesforce.

fields.title: Fields

tools.name: SALESFORCE_RETRIEVE_LEAD_DATA_WITH_VARIOUS_RESPONSES
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Retrieves Lead sObject data from Salesforce, such as recently viewed leads or general Lead object information.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveLeadDataWithVariousResponsesRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving Lead data. This operation does not require any specific input parameters.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_RETRIEVE_NOTE_OBJECT_INFORMATION
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Retrieves comprehensive metadata for the Salesforce 'Note' SObject, if it is enabled and accessible, to understand its structure and capabilities.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveNoteObjectInformationRequest
inputSchema.description: Request schema for `RetrieveNoteObjectInformation` action.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_RETRIEVE_OPPORTUNITIES_DATA
tools.description: Retrieves all available Opportunity records, representing potential revenue-generating deals, from Salesforce.

inputSchema.title: RetrieveOpportunitiesDataRequest
inputSchema.description:
Defines the request structure for retrieving Salesforce Opportunity records.
This action does not require any input parameters in the request body to fetch all opportunities.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_RETRIEVE_OPPORTUNITY_BY_ID_WITH_OPTIONAL_FIELDS

id.description: The unique Salesforce ID of the Opportunity record to retrieve. This is a required path parameter.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: An optional, comma-delimited list of API names of the Opportunity fields to retrieve. If not specified, all accessible fields for the Opportunity object will be returned. This parameter is used as a query parameter in the GET request.

inputSchema.description: Defines the request parameters for retrieving a Salesforce Opportunity by its ID, with an option to specify desired fields.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_RETRIEVE_SPECIFIC_CAMPAIGN_OBJECT_DETAILS

id.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the Salesforce Campaign object to retrieve. Example: '001R0000005hDFYIA2'.

fields.description: Optional comma-delimited list of field API names for the Campaign object whose values you want to retrieve (e.g., 'name,description,numberofemployees,industry'). Field names are case-sensitive and should match Salesforce API names. If unspecified, all accessible fields are returned.

inputSchema.description: Defines the request parameters for the action to retrieve specific details of a Salesforce Campaign object.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_RETRIEVE_SPECIFIC_CONTACT_BY_ID

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique Salesforce ID of the Contact record to retrieve.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Comma-delimited string of Contact field API names to retrieve. If omitted, a default set of fields is returned.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving a Salesforce Contact by ID.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_RUN_REPORT

billing_state.title: Billing State

billing_country.title: Billing Country

inputSchema.title: UpdateLeadByIdWithJsonPayloadRequest

Id.title: Id
Id.description: Salesforce ID of the Lead. If included in the request body, it must match the `id` in the URL path; generally not needed in the body for updates.

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique Salesforce ID of the Lead to update (e.g., 001R0000005hDFYIA2); this is a required path parameter.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Read-only full name of the lead (concatenation of FirstName, MiddleName, LastName, Suffix; max 203 characters).

Jigsaw.title: Jigsaw
Jigsaw.description: Data.com (Jigsaw) contact ID reference (max 20 chars). Indicates Data.com import. Do not modify. Label: Data.com Key.

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Current status (e.g., Open, Contacted); defined in LeadStatus picklist.

Company.title: Company
Company.description: Required. Company the lead works for. If person accounts are enabled and Company is null, the lead converts to a person account.

OwnerId.title: Owner Id
OwnerId.description: Salesforce User ID of the lead owner.

Industry.title: Industry
Industry.description: Primary industry of the lead's company.

Latitude.title: Latitude
Latitude.description: WGS84 latitude in decimal degrees (-90.0 to 90.0, up to 15 decimal places).

PhotoUrl.title: Photo Url
PhotoUrl.description: Relative URL path to the lead's photo; combine with Salesforce instance URL for full image URL. Empty if Social Accounts and Contacts is disabled.

IsDeleted.title: Is Deleted
IsDeleted.description: Specifies if the Lead is in the Recycle Bin. Label: Deleted.

Longitude.title: Longitude
Longitude.description: WGS84 longitude in decimal degrees (-180.0 to 180.0, up to 15 decimal places).

PostalCode.title: Postal Code
PostalCode.description: Postal code (e.g., ZIP code). Label: Zip/Postal Code.

Primary__c.title: Primary  C
Primary__c.description: Custom field, often indicating primary contact status.

SICCode__c.title: Sic Code  C
SICCode__c.description: Custom field for Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code.

CleanStatus.title: Clean Status
CleanStatus.description: Data cleanliness status compared with Data.com (e.g., Matched/In Sync, Acknowledged/Reviewed).

CreatedById.title: Created By Id
CreatedById.description: Read-only ID of the user who created the lead.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: Free-text description or notes (up to 32,000 characters).

IsConverted.title: Is Converted
IsConverted.description: Read-only flag indicating if the lead has been converted. Label: Converted.

IndividualId.title: Individual Id

AnnualRevenue.title: Annual Revenue
AnnualRevenue.description: Annual revenue of the lead's company.

DandbCompanyId.title: Dandb Company Id
DandbCompanyId.description: Typically read-only D&B Company ID used by Data.com.

LastViewedDate.title: Last Viewed Date
LastViewedDate.description: Read-only timestamp of when the current user last viewed this lead (ISO 8601).

MasterRecordId.title: Master Record Id
MasterRecordId.description: ID of the master Lead record if this Lead was merged and deleted; `null` otherwise.

SystemModstamp.title: System Modstamp
SystemModstamp.description: Read-only timestamp of last system modification (ISO 8601).

GeocodeAccuracy.title: Geocode Accuracy

IsUnreadByOwner.title: Is Unread By Owner
IsUnreadByOwner.description: Specifies if the lead is unread by its owner. Label: Unread By Owner.

JigsawContactId.title: Jigsaw Contact Id
JigsawContactId.description: Typically read-only Data.com (Jigsaw) contact ID for integration.
