tools.name: SALESFORCE_UPDATE_OPPORTUNITY_BY_ID
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Updates specified fields of an existing Salesforce Opportunity by its ID; the Opportunity must exist, and some fields (like Name, StageName, CloseDate) may have specific Salesforce validation rules if being modified, while read-only fields update indirectly based on other changes.

inputSchema.title: UpdateOpportunityByIdRequest

Id.title: Id
Id.description: Salesforce ID of the Opportunity; should match the 'id' in the URL path if provided.

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique Salesforce ID of the Opportunity to update (e.g., 006P0000004iVBDIA2).

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Name for this opportunity. Max 120 characters.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Type of opportunity (e.g., 'New Business', 'Existing Customer'). Label: Opportunity Type.

IsWon.title: Is Won
IsWon.description: Read-only. Indicates if won. Controlled by StageName. Label: Won.

Amount.title: Amount
Amount.description: Estimated total sale amount. If the opportunity has products, this amount is the sum of the related products and direct updates to this field are ignored.

Fiscal.title: Fiscal
Fiscal.description: If fiscal years are not enabled: name of the fiscal quarter/period for CloseDate (Format: "YYYY Q", e.g., "2023 1").

OwnerId.title: Owner Id
OwnerId.description: ID of the User owner. Updating may change previous owner's record access. Requires 'Transfer Record' permission (API v16.0+).

IsClosed.title: Is Closed
IsClosed.description: Read-only. Indicates if closed. Controlled by StageName. Label: Closed.

NextStep.title: Next Step
examples: Follow up call scheduled for next week.
NextStep.description: Next task in closing the opportunity. Max 255 characters.

AccountId.title: Account Id
AccountId.description: ID of the associated Account, which must exist in Salesforce.

CloseDate.title: Close Date
CloseDate.description: Expected close date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

ContactId.title: Contact Id
ContactId.description: Read-only. ID of primary Contact, derived from OpportunityContactRole. Set at creation via IsPrimary flag on OpportunityContactRole (API v46.0+).

IsDeleted.title: Is Deleted
IsDeleted.description: Indicates if the object is in the Recycle Bin. Label: Deleted.

IsPrivate.title: Is Private
IsPrivate.description: If true, the opportunity is private, visible only to the owner and administrators.

PushCount.title: Push Count
PushCount.description: Number of times this record has been synchronized with a mobile device. Used by Salesforce mobile applications.

StageName.title: Stage Name
StageName.description: Current stage (e.g., 'Prospecting'). Updating automatically updates ForecastCategoryName, IsClosed, IsWon, and Probability. Query OpportunityStage object for available names.

CampaignId.title: Campaign Id
CampaignId.description: ID of a related Campaign. Requires Campaigns feature enabled and read access to the Campaign object.

FiscalYear.title: Fiscal Year
FiscalYear.description: Fiscal year of the CloseDate (e.g., 2024), based on organization's fiscal year settings.

CreatedById.title: Created By Id
CreatedById.description: Read-only. ID of the user who created this record.

Description.title: Description
examples: Opportunity to provide cloud services to Acme Corp.
Description.description: Text description of the opportunity. Max 32,000 characters.

Probability.title: Probability
Probability.description: Estimated confidence percentage (0-100) in closing. Usually implied by StageName, but can be overridden. Round decimal probabilities to whole numbers.

Pricebook2Id.title: Pricebook2 Id
Pricebook2Id.description: ID of the associated Pricebook2. Required to add line items if products are enabled. Cannot update if line items exist.

FiscalQuarter.title: Fiscal Quarter
FiscalQuarter.description: Fiscal quarter (1-4) of the CloseDate, based on organization's fiscal year settings.

HasOverdueTask.title: Has Overdue Task
HasOverdueTask.description: Read-only. True if opportunity has an overdue task (API v35.0+).

LastViewedDate.title: Last Viewed Date
LastViewedDate.description: Read-only. Timestamp current user last viewed this record (ISO 8601 UTC). Null if only referenced (LastReferencedDate).

OrderNumber__c.title: Order Number  C
OrderNumber__c.description: Order number associated with the opportunity.

SystemModstamp.title: System Modstamp
SystemModstamp.description: Read-only. Last system modification timestamp (ISO 8601 UTC), by user or automation.

ExpectedRevenue.title: Expected Revenue
ExpectedRevenue.description: Read-only. Calculated as Amount * Probability. Updated by changes to Amount or Probability.

HasOpenActivity.title: Has Open Activity
HasOpenActivity.description: Read-only. True if opportunity has an open event or task (API v35.0+).

attributes__url.title: Attributes  Url
attributes__url.description: Relative URL of the SObject record in Salesforce. Generally Salesforce-provided.

ForecastCategory.title: Forecast Category
ForecastCategory.description: Forecast category (e.g., 'Pipeline', 'BestCase'). Implied by StageName but can be overridden. In API v12.0+, value is set via ForecastCategoryName.

LastActivityDate.title: Last Activity Date
LastActivityDate.description: Read-only. Due date of most recent event or last closed task (YYYY-MM-DD).

LastModifiedById.title: Last Modified By Id
LastModifiedById.description: Read-only. ID of the user who last modified this record.

attributes__type.title: Attributes  Type
attributes__type.description: Type of the Salesforce SObject (e.g., 'Opportunity'). Generally Salesforce-provided.

TrackingNumber__c.title: Tracking Number  C
TrackingNumber__c.description: Tracking number related to the opportunity.

LastReferencedDate.title: Last Referenced Date
LastReferencedDate.description: Read-only. Timestamp current user last accessed this record or a related record (ISO 8601 UTC).

LastStageChangeDate.title: Last Stage Change Date
LastStageChangeDate.description: Read-only. Timestamp of last stage change (ISO 8601 UTC).

CurrentGenerators__c.title: Current Generators  C
examples: GenX Model A, GenY Model B
CurrentGenerators__c.description: Information about current generators related to the opportunity.

ForecastCategoryName.title: Forecast Category Name
ForecastCategoryName.description: API v12.0+. Name of the forecast category (e.g., 'Pipeline'). Implied by StageName but can be overridden.

HasOpportunityLineItem.title: Has Opportunity Line Item
HasOpportunityLineItem.description: Read-only. True if opportunity has line items (Products). Requires assigned Pricebook to add line items.

TotalOpportunityQuantity.title: Total Opportunity Quantity
TotalOpportunityQuantity.description: Number of items in this opportunity. Used in quantity-based forecasting.

LastAmountChangedHistoryId.title: Last Amount Changed History Id
LastAmountChangedHistoryId.description: Read-only. ID of OpportunityHistory record for last Amount update (API v50.0+).

DeliveryInstallationStatus__c.title: Delivery Installation Status  C
DeliveryInstallationStatus__c.description: Delivery and installation status of the opportunity.

LastCloseDateChangedHistoryId.title: Last Close Date Changed History Id
LastCloseDateChangedHistoryId.description: Read-only. ID of OpportunityHistory record for last CloseDate update (API v50.0+).

inputSchema.description: Request schema for updating an existing Opportunity by its unique Salesforce ID.

tools.name: SALESFORCE_UPDATE_SPECIFIC_NOTE_BY_ID
tools.description: DEPRECATED: Use `update_specific_note_by_id` instead. Updates specified fields of an existing Salesforce Note SObject identified by its ID; the Note must already exist.

inputSchema.title: UpdateSpecificNoteByIdRequest

Id.title: Id
Id.description: Salesforce ID of the Note. Generally not modified as the record ID is specified in the URL path (`id`). If included, it should match the `id` in the path.

id.title: Id
id.description: The 18-character Salesforce ID of the Note SObject to be updated. This is a required path parameter. (Note: actual Note IDs typically start with `002`).

Body.title: Body
examples: Updated action items: Send proposal by EOD.
Body.description: Content or body of the Note. Limited to 32 KB.

OwnerId.title: Owner Id
OwnerId.description: The 18-character Salesforce ID of the User who owns the Note. Updating this changes Note ownership.

ParentId.title: Parent Id
ParentId.description: ID of the parent SObject (e.g., Account, Contact, Opportunity) to which this Note is related; can be updated. Salesforce Note objects often require a `ParentId`.

IsDeleted.title: Is Deleted
IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the Note has been moved to the Recycle Bin (`true`) or not (`false`). Set to `true` to soft-delete. Label: `Deleted`.

IsPrivate.title: Is Private
IsPrivate.description: Controls Note visibility. If `true`, Note is private (accessible only by owner or users with 'Modify All Data'). If `false` (default), visibility based on sharing rules. Note: users without 'Modify All Data' setting this `true` on a non-owned note might lose access. Label: `Private`.

CreatedById.title: Created By Id
CreatedById.description: Salesforce ID of the User who created the Note (Salesforce field `CreatedById`). System-generated, read-only, and not updatable.

CreatedDate.title: Created Date
CreatedDate.description: Timestamp of Note creation (Salesforce field `CreatedDate`). System-generated, read-only, and not updatable through this action.

SystemModstamp.title: System Modstamp
SystemModstamp.description: Timestamp of Note record's last modification by user or system (Salesforce field `SystemModstamp`). System-generated, read-only, not updatable.

attributes__url.title: Attributes  Url
attributes__url.description: Relative URL for the SObject record. System-managed metadata, not part of an update request.

LastModifiedById.title: Last Modified By Id
LastModifiedById.description: Salesforce ID of the User who last modified the Note (Salesforce field `LastModifiedById`). System-generated, read-only, and not updatable.

LastModifiedDate.title: Last Modified Date
LastModifiedDate.description: Timestamp of Note's last modification (Salesforce field `LastModifiedDate`). System-generated, read-only, and not updatable.

attributes__type.title: Attributes  Type
attributes__type.description: Type of the SObject, typically 'Note'. System-managed metadata, not part of an update request.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for updating a specific Note by its ID. Only include fields you want to update.
